00021 typedef std::vector<CString>::iterator CStringVectorIterator;
00026 inline WCHAR * WSTRClone(const WCHAR *oldstr)
00027 {
00028   WCHAR *newstr;
00029   if(oldstr==NULL)
00030     oldstr=L"";
00031 
00032   newstr = (WCHAR*)CoTaskMemAlloc(sizeof(WCHAR) * (wcslen(oldstr) + 1));
00033 
00034   if(newstr) 
00035     wcscpy(newstr, oldstr);
00036   return newstr;
00037 }

00039 #ifdef SMARTPOINTER
00040 #include <boost/intrusive_ptr.hpp>
00041 
00045 template<typename T>
00046 class ISmartPointer
00047 {
00048 public:
00049   ISmartPointer() : _refs(0) {}
00051   virtual ~ISmartPointer(){};
00052 //private:
00053   int _refs; 
00054   friend inline void intrusive_ptr_release(T* pThis)
00055   {
00056     if(--pThis->_refs == 0 ) { 
00057       delete pThis;
00058     }
00059   }
00060   friend inline void intrusive_ptr_add_ref(T* pThis)
00061   {
00062     pThis->_refs++;
00063   }
00064   friend inline void intrusive_ptr_release(const T* pThis)
00065   {
00066     if(--const_cast<T*>(pThis)->_refs == 0 ) { 
00067       delete const_cast<T*>(pThis);
00068     }
00069   }
00070   friend inline void intrusive_ptr_add_ref(const T* pThis)
00071   {
00072     const_cast<T*>(pThis)->_refs++;
00073 
00074   }
00075 };
00076 #endif

00079 inline CString LoadResString(UINT id) { CString txt; txt.LoadString((UINT) id); return txt; }
00080 
00083 inline CString ToString(std::vector<CString> &strings, CString separator=_T(" "))
00084 {
00085   CString tmp; 
00086   for(UINT i=0; i< strings.size(); i++) 
00087     tmp.AppendFormat(_T("%s%s"), ((i>0)? separator : _T("")), strings.at(i));  
00088   return tmp; 
00089 }
00090 inline int StrCount(CString s, char c) { int n=0; for(int i=0; i<s.GetLength(); i++) if(s.GetAt(i)==c) n++; return n; }

00093 template<class T>
00094 class TResizingTable  
00095 {
00096 public:
00097   typedef std::vector<T>  StepTableRow; 
00098 
00099 
00100   TResizingTable<T>() //: table (10, std::vector<T>(10)) 
00101   {
00102     
00103   }
00104   T & operator ()( int i, int j=0) 
00105   {
00106     return this->at(i,j);
00107     //if(i>=table.size() ) 
00108     //  table.resize(i+1);
00109     //if(j>=table[i].size())
00110     //  table[i].resize(j+1);
00111     //return table[i][j];
00112 
00113   }
00114   std::vector<T> & operator[](int i) 
00115   { 
00116     if(i>=table.size() ) 
00117       table.resize(i+1);
00118     return table[i]; 
00119   }
00120   void clear() {table.clear();   }
00121   int rows() {  table.size();}
00122   int cols(int i) { if(i<table.size())  return table[i].size(); return 0;}
00123   int size() { return table.size(); }
00124    bool isDuplicate(std::vector<T> & row)
00125    {
00126     for(int i=0; i< table.size(); i++)
00127       if(table[i]==row)
00128         return true;
00129     return false;   
00130    }
00131    T & at( int i, int j) 
00132    {
00133      if(i>=table.size() ) 
00134        table.resize(i+1);
00135      if(j>=table[i].size())
00136        table[i].resize(j+1);
00137      return table[i][j];
00138 
00139    }
00140    void push_back(int i, T val) { int n=cols(i); this->at(i,n+1) = val; }
00141    void push_back(T val) { int n=size(); this->at(n,0) = val; }
00142 
00143    std::vector< std::vector<T> > table;
00144 
00145 };
00146 typedef TResizingTable<_variant_t>  VarTable;
00147 typedef std::vector<_variant_t> VarList;
00148 typedef TResizingTable<CString>  StringTable;
00149 
00150 
00151 inline bool CompareVariants(_variant_t a, _variant_t b, VARTYPE vt)
00152 {
00153   try {
00154     if(a.vt == b.vt)
00155       return a==b;
00156     a.ChangeType(vt);
00157     b.ChangeType(vt);
00158     if(a==b)
00159       return true;
00160 
00161   }
00162   catch(...)
00163   {
00164   }
00165   return false;
00166 
00167 }

00169 
00170 class CStringVector : public std::vector<CString> 
00171 {
00172 public:
00173   typedef std::vector<CString>  Baseclass;
00174   CStringVector(){}
00175 
00176   operator const std::vector<CString> () {std::vector<CString>  to_vector;  copy( this->begin(), this->end(), to_vector.begin() ); return to_vector;} 
00177   CStringVector & operator = (const  std::vector<CString> & from)
00178   {
00179     this->resize(from.size());
00180     copy( from.begin(), from.end(), this->begin() );
00181     return *this;
00182   }
00183   CStringVector( std::vector<CString> & from)
00184   {
00185     this->resize(from.size());
00186     copy( from.begin(), from.end(), this->begin() );
00187   }
00188   explicit CStringVector(int n, ...) 
00189   { 
00190     va_list ap; 
00191     va_start(ap,n); 
00192     for(int i=0; i< n; i++)
00193     {
00194       CString s =va_arg ( ap, CString );
00195       push_back(s);
00196     }
00197     va_end(ap);
00198   }
00199   CString Merge() { CString tmp; for(UINT i=0; i< size(); i++) tmp+=at(i);  return tmp; }
00200   CString ToString(CString separator=_T(" ")) { 
00201     CString tmp; 
00202     for(UINT i=0; i< size(); i++) 
00203     {
00204       if(i>0)
00205         tmp.AppendFormat(_T("%s"), separator);  
00206       tmp.AppendFormat(_T("%s"), at(i));  
00207     }
00208     return tmp; 
00209   }
00210   void RemoveBlankStrings()
00211   {
00212     for(int i=0; i<size(); i++)
00213     {
00214       CString tmp = this->at(i);
00215       tmp.Replace(_T(" "), _T(""));
00216       tmp.Replace(_T("\t"), _T(""));
00217       if(tmp.GetLength() < 1)
00218       {
00219         erase(begin() + i);
00220         i--;
00221       }
00222 
00223     }
00224   }
00225   static CStringVector Tokenize(CString str, CString tokens, int bSave=0)
00226   {
00227     CString resToken;
00228     int curPos= 0;
00229     CStringVector strs;
00230 
00231     resToken= str.Tokenize(tokens,curPos);
00232     while (resToken != "")
00233     {
00234       strs.push_back((!bSave) ? resToken: resToken+str[curPos-1]);  
00235       resToken= str.Tokenize(tokens,curPos);
00236     };
00237     return strs;
00238   }
00239   static CStringVector Extract(CString str, CString tokenA, CString tokenB, int bSave=0)
00240   {
00241     CStringVector strs;
00242     int curPos= str.Find(tokenA);
00243 
00244     str=str.Mid(curPos+1);
00245 
00246     while((curPos=str.Find(tokenB))>=0)
00247     {
00248       strs.push_back(str.Mid(0,curPos));
00249       str=str.Mid(curPos+1);
00250       if((curPos= str.Find(tokenA)) < 0)
00251         break;
00252       str=str.Mid(curPos+1); 
00253       
00254     }
00255     return strs;
00256   }
00257 
00258 
00259 };
00260 
00261 inline _bstr_t bstrFormat(const TCHAR* format, ...)
00262 {
00263     CString str;
00264     va_list ptr; va_start(ptr, format);
00265     str.FormatV(format, ptr);
00266     // Trace model: ATL::CTrace::s_trace.TraceV(m_pszFileName, m_nLineNo, dwCategory, nLevel, pszFmt, ptr);
00267     va_end(ptr);
00268     return _bstr_t((LPCTSTR) str);
00269 
00270 }
00271 
00272 inline CString StrFormat(const TCHAR* format, ...)
00273 {
00274     CString str;
00275     va_list ptr; va_start(ptr, format);
00276     str.FormatV(format, ptr);
00277     // Trace model: ATL::CTrace::s_trace.TraceV(m_pszFileName, m_nLineNo, dwCategory, nLevel, pszFmt, ptr);
00278     va_end(ptr);
00279     return str;
00280 
00281 }
00282 inline std::vector<CString> DoubleZeroString(const TCHAR* str, int size)
00283 {
00284   CString tmp;
00285   int curPos= 0;
00286   char last = '1';
00287   std::vector<CString> strs;
00288   
00289   for(int i=0; i<size; i++) 
00290   {
00291     if(last==0 && str[i]==0)
00292       break;
00293     if(str[i]==0)
00294     {
00295       strs.push_back(tmp);  
00296       tmp.Empty();
00297     }
00298     else
00299     {
00300       tmp+=str[i];
00301     }
00302     last=str[i];
00303 
00304   };
00305   if(!tmp.IsEmpty())
00306     strs.push_back(tmp);  
00307   return strs;
00308 
00309 }
00310 inline CString StrReplace(CString inStr, int pos, int n, CString newStr)
00311 {
00312     return inStr.Mid(0,pos)+ newStr + inStr.Mid(pos+n);
00313 
00314 }
00315 
00316 inline boolean ReplacePattern(CString & inStr, CString oldBeginningStr, CString oldEndingStr, CString newStr){
00317   int i,j,k;
00318 
00319   // Sanity checks
00320   if(inStr.IsEmpty()) 
00321     return false;
00322   if(oldBeginningStr.IsEmpty()) 
00323     return false;
00324   if(oldEndingStr.IsEmpty()) 
00325     return false;
00326 
00327   // Setup up StringEx sizes
00328   int newCnt = newStr.GetLength();  
00329 
00330   i=0; // Let find determine where to start.
00331 
00332   int cnt=0;
00333   for(;i<inStr.GetLength();)
00334   {
00335     if((j=inStr.Find(oldBeginningStr,  i))<0)
00336       break;
00337     if((k=inStr.Find(oldEndingStr, j))<0) 
00338       break;
00339     inStr = inStr.Mid(0,j)+ newStr + inStr.Mid(k+oldEndingStr.GetLength());
00340     i=j+newCnt;
00341     cnt++;
00342   }
00343   if(cnt>0) return true;
00344   return false;
00345 }
00346 
00347 // other pattern uses   GetPartSpecifics("1857-R1.tap", CString("{[0-9]+}[-_]{[0-9a-zA-Z]+}\\..*"), szProdLine, szPartNumber);
00348 inline CString ReplacePattern(CString &inStr,  CString szRegexPattern, CString szReplacement=_T(""))
00349 {
00350   CString tmp(inStr);
00351   CString test(inStr);;
00352   CAtlRegExp<> regexp;
00353   CAtlREMatchContext<> mc;
00354   CString szMatch;
00355   int pos=0;
00356   try {
00357     //pattern.Replace(_T("*"), _T(".*"));  // Change from Regular expression to Bourne Expression
00358     if(regexp.Parse(szRegexPattern) == REPARSE_ERROR_OK)
00359     {
00360       while(regexp.Match(test, &mc) )
00361       {
00362         const CAtlREMatchContext<>::RECHAR* szStart = 0;
00363         const CAtlREMatchContext<>::RECHAR* szEnd = 0;
00364 
00365         //for(UINT i=0; i< mc.m_uNumGroups; i++){
00366           mc.GetMatch(0, &szStart, &szEnd);
00367           ptrdiff_t nLength = szEnd - szStart;
00368           szMatch.SetString( szStart,  nLength );
00369           UINT n = test.Find(szMatch);
00370           tmp = StrReplace(tmp, n+pos, (int) nLength, szReplacement) ; // inStr.Replace(szMatch, szReplacement);
00371           pos = pos + n +  nLength - szReplacement.GetLength() ;
00372         //}
00373         test=tmp.Mid(pos);
00374       }
00375     }
00376 
00377   }
00378   catch(...) {}
00379   return tmp;
00380 }
00381 
00382 inline int FindPattern(CString inStr, CString szRegexPattern)
00383 {
00384   CString tmp;
00385   CAtlRegExp<> regexp;
00386   CAtlREMatchContext<> mc;
00387   int n=-1;
00388   try {
00389     //pattern.Replace(_T("*"), _T(".*"));  // Change from Regular expression to Bourne Expression
00390     if(regexp.Parse(szRegexPattern) == REPARSE_ERROR_OK)
00391     {
00392       if(regexp.Match(inStr, &mc) )
00393       {
00394         const CAtlREMatchContext<>::RECHAR* szStart = 0;
00395         const CAtlREMatchContext<>::RECHAR* szEnd = 0;
00396 
00397         if(mc.m_uNumGroups>0)
00398         {
00399           mc.GetMatch(0, &szStart, &szEnd);
00400           return (int) (inStr.GetBuffer() - szEnd );
00401 //          szProdLine.SetString( szStart,  nLength );
00402         }
00403 
00404 
00405       }
00406     }
00407   }catch(...) {}
00408   return n;
00409 }
00410 
00411 inline int HandleWindowsMessages()
00412 {
00413   MSG msg;
00414   while (PeekMessage(&msg, NULL, 0, 0, PM_NOREMOVE))
00415   {
00416     //OutputDebugString(StringEx("After Message=%x wParam = %d  lParam = %d LOWORD(lParam) = %d HIWORD(lParam) = %d\n",msg.message, msg.wParam,msg.lParam, LOWORD(msg.lParam), HIWORD(msg.lParam)));
00417     if (msg.message == WM_QUIT)
00418       return 1;       
00419 
00420     ::GetMessage(&msg, NULL, 0, 0);
00421     TranslateMessage(&msg);
00422     DispatchMessage(&msg);
00423   }
00424   return 0;
00425 } 
00426 
00427 inline void CopyClipboard(CString source)
00428 {
00429   // Converts TCHAR into char for ascii clipboard
00430   if(::OpenClipboard(NULL))
00431   {
00432     HGLOBAL clipbuffer;
00433     ::EmptyClipboard();
00434     clipbuffer = ::GlobalAlloc(GMEM_DDESHARE, sizeof(TCHAR) * (source.GetLength()+1));
00435 
00436 #ifdef UNICODE
00437     WCHAR * buffer;
00438     buffer = (WCHAR *)::GlobalLock(clipbuffer);
00439     wcscpy(buffer, source);
00440     ::GlobalUnlock(clipbuffer); 
00441     ::SetClipboardData(CF_UNICODETEXT,clipbuffer);
00442 
00443 #else
00444     char * buffer;
00445     buffer = (char *)::GlobalLock(clipbuffer);
00446     strcpy(buffer, (LPCTSTR) source);
00447     ::GlobalUnlock(clipbuffer);   
00448     :SetClipboardData(CF_TEXT,clipbuffer);
00449 
00450 #endif
00451     ::CloseClipboard();
00452   }
00453 }

00464 inline CString ReadAFile(CString lpszPathName)
00465 {
00466   CString sBuffer;
00467   HANDLE  hFile = CreateFile(lpszPathName,
00468     GENERIC_READ,              // open for reading 
00469     FILE_SHARE_READ,           // share for reading 
00470     NULL,                      // no security 
00471     OPEN_EXISTING,             // existing file only 
00472     FILE_ATTRIBUTE_NORMAL,     // normal file 
00473     NULL);                  
00474 
00475   if (INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE == hFile)
00476   {
00477     //m_sLastErrmsg="File INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE Error";
00478     return _T("");
00479   }
00480   DWORD dwBytesRead;
00481   DWORD dwFileSize = GetFileSize(hFile, NULL);
00482 
00483   BYTE * lpBuffer = new BYTE[dwFileSize+1];
00484 
00485   if (!ReadFile(hFile, lpBuffer, dwFileSize, &dwBytesRead, NULL) != FALSE)
00486   {
00487     return _T("");
00488   }
00489 
00490   lpBuffer[dwBytesRead]=0;
00491   sBuffer=lpBuffer;
00492   delete [] lpBuffer;        
00493 
00494   CloseHandle(hFile);
00495   return sBuffer;
00496 }
00497 
00498 inline CString GetExeDirectory() 
00499 {
00500   TCHAR buf[1000];
00501   CString path;
00502   GetModuleFileName(NULL, buf, 1000);
00503   path=buf;
00504   path = path.Left(path.ReverseFind('\\')+1);
00505   return path;
00506 }
00507 inline CString GetIniFile()
00508 {
00509   return StrFormat(_T("%s\\Setup.ini"), GetExeDirectory());
00510 
00511 }
00512 
00513 inline CString UpDirectory(CString szDir) 
00514 {
00515   CString path = szDir.Left(szDir.ReverseFind('\\')+1);
00516   return path;
00517 }

00519 #include <fstream>
00520 
00521 inline BOOL SaveDocument(CString filename, CString buffer)
00522 {
00523   try
00524   {
00525     tfstream outputfile;
00526     outputfile.open (filename, tfstream::out );
00527     if (!outputfile.is_open())
00528       return FALSE;
00529     outputfile <<  (LPCTSTR) buffer;
00530     outputfile.close();
00531   } 
00532   catch (...)
00533   {
00534     return FALSE;
00535   }
00536   return TRUE;
00537 }
00538 
00539 inline boolean  GetFileExists(CString filename)
00540 {
00541   DWORD dw = ::GetFileAttributes(filename);
00542   return((dw == 0xfffffffff) ? FALSE : dw );
00543 
00544 }
00545 
00546 inline double DVal(CString values, int n,  CString separator)
00547 {
00548   CStringVector tokens=CStringVector::Tokenize(values, separator);
00549   if(n<0 || n>=tokens.size())
00550     return 0;
00551   return _tstof(tokens[n]);
00552 
00553 }

00556 inline CString dump_com_error(_com_error &e)
00557 {
00558   CString tmp;
00559   tmp+=StrFormat(_T("Error\n"));
00560   tmp+=StrFormat(_T("\a\tCode = %08lx\n"), e.Error());
00561   tmp+=StrFormat(_T("\a\tCode meaning = %s"), e.ErrorMessage());
00562   tmp+=StrFormat(_T("\a\tSource = %s\n"), (LPCTSTR) e.Source());
00563   tmp+=StrFormat(_T("\a\tDescription = %s\n"), (LPCTSTR) e.Description());
00564   return tmp;
00565 }
